fwdSensors.FwdSoilMoistureClient.fwdIsMo: Runs code when the moisture level goes above or below a set threshold
run when the level is above or below your set threshold
what moisture level is the cut off before the code is run
fwdSensors.FwdSoilMoistureClient.fwdMois: Returns the sensor's moisture level as a number between 0-100
fwdSensors.FwdSoilMoistureClient.fwdOnMo: Runs code when the moisture level changes by more than a certain amount between readings
how many percent two readings have to differ by before code is run
